title: Opening
script: SIAM - the AI-powered assistant that doesn't just answer questions,
it learns from feedback and heals its own tests.
Let me show you our three pillars: Chat, Curate, and Test.

title: Chat Pillar Demo
script: First, the Chat pillar.
Ask AOMA anything about your music catalog.
Notice the inline citations - click to see the exact source.
And here's the magic: after each response, we offer a Nano Banana diagram.
actions: Type: 'What are the royalty calculation rules in AOMA 9.1?'

title: Curate Pillar Demo
script: Second, the Curate pillar.
This is where humans train the AI.
Every thumbs down becomes training data.
Watch - I'll submit detailed feedback with a correction.
This goes to our curator queue.
actions: Click thumbs down on a response

title: Test Pillar Demo
script: Third, the Test pillar.
Here's the problem: when a developer changes one button ID, 47 tests break.
That's your blast radius.
Our self-healing system uses AI to automatically repair broken selectors.
actions: Trigger Tier 1 scenario (curl command or UI)
Show: '78% confidence - Queued for QA review'
Explain: 'The button moved to the sidebar - AI detects this isn't the same context'

title: Code Highlights
script: Let me show you what makes this work.
Here's the three-tier scenario definition -
the AI understands that same ID in different context means different confidence.
And here's the real Gemini 3 Pro integration - this isn't mock data.

title: Closing
script: Three pillars working together.
Chat answers questions with real sources.
Curate lets humans train the AI.
Test heals itself with 94% success rate.
This is how we build AI that gets better every day.
